name: Idle Tetris (Alpha)
description:
This game was made with just one line of code a day for 730 days (2 years) for a challenge. It's fully documented:

Here's a curated making-of playlist here (showing the progress and story)

And here is a playlist containing every single day

The game is currently in an alpha-release state and will continue to be developed daily with just one line of code a day.  A "let's play" podcast of me playtesting the game and discussing various topics, such as what got me into game development, will be out soon.

There are a few known bugs but no feature of the game is made inaccessible by these bugs.

Credits:
